domainIncludes.comment: A legal proof of ownership, worthiness or qualification to operate an agricultural item.
A named, delimited and identified part of a land and or water surface of the globe subject to dedicated uniform agricultural treatment.
A small piece of land or water used for a crop such as an agricultural or aquacultural crop.
A collection of data for a piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence about the identity of an animal or a batch of animals.
A method or substance, such as chemical fertilizers and crop protection products, applied to plant growth whilst managing and controlling diseases and pests.
Any substance such as seed, fertilizer, water, gas or chemical applied to an agricultural field, substrate, construction, plant, animal or product.
A group of crop produce considered or dealt with together.
A Track and Trace (TT) animal, such as one kept or raised on a farm, ranch.
A group of animals dealt with together.
Agricultural plants or plant products grown and harvested, such as grain, fruit, vegetables, silage.
A prominent attribute or aspect of an agricultural object.
Information about an animal which uniquely identifies it.
